child.name: aEndTpDataList
child.description:
This attribute lists all A End Flow Point names together with their TP data (TP Mapping Mode, Transmission Parameters).

This attribute has multiplicity *

This attribute is optional
child.label: aEndTpDataList

child.name: zEndTpDataList
child.description:
This attribute lists all Z End Flow Point names together with their TP data (TP Mapping Mode, Transmission Parameters).

This attribute has multiplicity *

This attribute is optional
child.label: zEndTpDataList

child.name: state
child.description:
This attribute indicates if the FDFr is active or partial.

This attribute has multiplicity 0..1

This attribute is optional
child.label: state

child.name: transmissionParameterList
child.description:
This attribute contains the technology-specific parameters associated with the different connectionless layers that are supported by the FDFr. Refer to to chapter Connectionless Technology Parameters of the attached supporting document SD1-16_LayeredParameters for details of the currently defined Transmission Parameters

This attribute has multiplicity 0..1

This attribute is optional
child.label: transmissionParameterList

child.name: ituArcStateAndStatusList
child.description:
See R_TMF518_NRB_I_0001 and R_TMF518_NRB_I_0004. See supporting document SD1-8_encodingX731M3100

This attribute has multiplicity 0..1

This attribute is optional
child.label: ituArcStateAndStatusList

child.name: administrativeState
child.description:
This attribute defines administratively the role that the Route shall play for the belonging SNC. There is not any relationship with the actualState attribute of the Route. It can have the following values: - "locked", the route is not allowed to be active - "unlocked", the route is allowed to be active. This attribute indicates whether the FDFr is locked (i.e., traffic units cannot flow through the FDFr) or unlocked (i.e., traffic units are allowed to flow through the FDFr).

This attribute has multiplicity 0..1

This attribute is optional
child.label: administrativeState
